title: Is every decision I make already determined? - Quora

response.answer_text: Those who have trust in god believe that every decision is already determined. but the god gave brain to the people to get themselves safe from bad things happen. Those who have no trust in god they believe that the responsibility of taking decision is up-to human. whatever it is the god gave us freedom to think and change our design (fate).

Not determined, but we get signals from our biology and our genes, tendencies and general traits, and these incline us to be disposed in certain ways. Take Pascal’s observation: The heart has it reasons that reason knows nothing of. My seven year old grandson finds a certain girl in his class attractive. That’s probably mostly biology and genes, don’t you think?
